title: Prototype Litter Box Otomatis Berbasis Arduino UNO
description: Designed and built an automated litter box system using Arduino UNO, featuring self-cleaning and odor control mechanisms to improve pet hygiene.

title: Sistem Kendali Kualitas Produk Botol Minuman Menggunakan Image Processing Berbasis Phyton
description: Developed an image processing system with Python to detect defects in bottle caps, integrating servo motor control to separate faulty products in real-time.

title: Rancang Bangun Pendulum Terbalik Linear dengan Kendali PID untuk Stabilisasi Sistem
description: Designed and implemented a linear inverted pendulum system with PID control using STM32, achieving stable balancing performance with real-time angle monitoring.
